entry.title: New Tourist eSIM Plan: 3GB for 14 Days at $12
entry.summary: Perfect for extended stays in Myanmar! Our new Tourist Plus plan offers 3GB of high-speed data valid for 14 days, ideal for travelers exploring multiple cities.
entry.content:
Introducing Tourist Plus eSIM Plan

We're excited to announce our latest eSIM offering designed specifically for travelers who need reliable connectivity during extended stays in Myanmar.

Plan Features:

  • 3GB High-Speed Data - Perfect for maps, messaging, and social media
  • 14-Day Validity - Extended coverage for longer trips
  • 4G/5G Networks - Fast speeds across Myanmar
  • Instant Activation - Ready to use in minutes
  • No Roaming Charges - Local rates throughout Myanmar

Perfect For:

✓ Extended business trips
✓ Multi-city tourism
✓ Digital nomads
✓ Backpackers exploring Myanmar

Coverage Areas:

Full coverage in Yangon, Mandalay, Naypyidaw, Bagan, Inle Lake, and major highways connecting these cities.

Get Tourist Plus Plan - $12

Available now with instant QR code delivery via email.
